entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Snow level rising to 500 metres this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 11. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 30%
